char_info.char_desc: The Siren Who Swims at Fast Speeds

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: The Bamboo Forest of the Lost doesn't have a river to begin with. Why is it there?
Greetings, Miss Hakurei. You have an opportunity to take advantage of your new hairstyle.
You can be a kannushi's bride!

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Even if you may know me, my hair won't be in a man's favor.
What are you going to do then?

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I intend to break the spell and restore my hairstyle, mergirl.

t_scene_info.speaker: Kisumi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: If you're going to call a mother a mergirl, think again. Just look who's also swimming with me!
Mom?

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Wait a minute. Is it that time-traveling girl again? Is the woman in the purple hair your mother?

t_scene_info.speaker: Kisumi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Yes, that is my daughter.

t_scene_info.speaker: Kagami:
t_scene_info.dialogue: This is what you need to do now, Mom.

t_scene_info.speaker: Kagami:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Yumi and I were attacked when we were avenging that primordial concert that drained our audiences.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Hold on, how come you aren't affected by this enchantment, Kagami?

t_scene_info.speaker: Kagami:
t_scene_info.dialogue: People coming from other time periods are not affected by this.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I'm convinced that there is a way to fix this problem.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I won't stand by; this hair debacle will not mark my downfall!

t_scene_info.speaker: Kisumi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: What do you intend to do, Reimu?

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I am searching for a solution to this problem.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: It appears to have originated in the Palace of Eternity.

t_scene_info.speaker: Kagami:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Before you turn it off, you should start singing to attract the river's inhabitants!

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I am not going to sit here and sing. I'm not good at that anyway.

t_scene_info.speaker: Kisumi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Reimu, I predict that you will fail to resolve this incident.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Why are you so pessimistic? You want to try me?

t_scene_info.speaker: Kisumi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: You will not be able to.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: For God's sake, I will not fail, you fushinja.

t_scene_info.speaker: Kisumi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: What did you just call me!?

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: If you don't shut up about failure, I will expel you from this time period.
